subject: Career
title: Micro-Recovery: The Power of Short Breaks
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Micro-Recovery: The Power of Short Breaks.

hook.text: You don't need a two-week vacation to recover. A ten-minute walk between meetings can shift your entire day.

buildup.text: Micro-recovery: brief breaks during the workday that restore attention and reduce fatigue.

discovery.text: Research shows a 5-minute walk every hour maintains productivity better than working straight through.

twist.text: The break's quality matters more than length. A mindful 5 minutes beats a distracted 30 minutes.

climax.text: Build micro-recovery into your day: walk between meetings, step outside, do breathing exercises.

punchline.text: Small breaks throughout the day beat one big recovery at the end.

quiz.question: What is micro-recovery?
options: Brief breaks during the workday that restore attention and reduce fatigue
